title: Senior Backend Engineer
description: We are looking for an experienced backend engineer to join our team. You will be responsible for designing and developing scalable backend systems, working with microservices architecture, and collaborating with cross-functional teams.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in backend development
Strong proficiency in Python and Django
Experience with PostgreSQL and database design

title: Frontend Developer
description: Join our frontend team to build beautiful and responsive user interfaces. You will work with modern JavaScript frameworks, collaborate with designers, and ensure excellent user experience.
requirements: Strong proficiency in React and TypeScript
Experience with modern CSS and responsive design

title: Product Manager
description: We are seeking a product manager to drive product strategy and execution. You will work closely with engineering, design, and business teams to deliver innovative products that meet customer needs.
requirements: Ability to work with cross-functional teams

title: Data Scientist
description: Join our data science team to build machine learning models, analyze data trends, and provide actionable insights. You will work on challenging problems and help drive data-driven decision making.
requirements: Strong proficiency in Python for data analysis
Knowledge of SQL and database systems

title: DevOps Engineer
description: We are looking for a DevOps engineer to manage our cloud infrastructure, automate deployments, and ensure system reliability. You will work with modern tools and technologies to build scalable infrastructure.
requirements: Strong knowledge of Docker and Kubernetes
preferred_skills: Experience with monitoring and logging tools
